channel.title: Dimitris Glezos' old personal site - Mini-post

item.title: Today’s exploration: Beauty
item.description: “In its most profound sense, beauty may engender a salient experience of positive reflection about the meaning of one’s own existence.” [article, video]
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Quote: On Teams
item.description: “I enjoy a working environment where the word ‘team’ is uttered in derision, and view the process of team or community as a result of mutual respect and enlightened self interest as opposed to a management method where fuzzy feelings are elicited to get the benefits and delegate the blame …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Skype wows
item.description: Calling to Greek landline phones (both in-town and country-wide) is cheaper with Skype than Forthnet. Yay for N900 handling all my local calls then.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Greetings.
item.description: “To the past, or to the future. To an age when thought is free. From the Age of Big Brother, from the Age of the Thought Police, from a dead man… greetings.” (1984)
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Rock Paper Scissors Spock Lizard
item.description: “Scissors cuts Paper covers Rock crushes Lizard poisons Spock smashes Scissors decapitates Lizard eats Paper disproves Spock vaporizes Rock crushes Scissors.” (via @mperedim)
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Life colors
item.description: “The friends of mine paint with a black color. Because you wasted their red.” (magic de spell)
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Maemo Summit
item.description: Yeehaa! I’m going to the Maemo Summit baby! Amsterdam, long time no see! #maesum
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Django Conference!
item.description: Getting ready for DjangoCon baby. Portland, here I come.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Coffee bean tanning
item.description: It seems my coffee beans are getting sour more quickly in the summer. More quickly than what I expected, I guess.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Περί θερμίδων ερωτήσεις
item.description: Σήμερα στο www.thermides.net, στις “τυχαίες αναζητήσεις”: Πανάνες Κοφλεξ Συροπιαστα Πασατεμπος Ξυλάγγουρο Γιερμαδες Μιλσεηκ Σεξ Μάφιν Βαζανια Φακητες Μπακλαβαδακι Πυραυλος Βοδιν Ψωμιά Κοκάκι Πιτογυρο Ραηςκρίσπις Βρώμικο Πετσα Κινέζικο
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos
